title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
December 5, 2020
On Saturday, December 5, 2020, the President signed into law:H.R. 8247, the “Veterans Comprehensive, Prevention, Access to Care, and Treatment Act of 2020 or the Veterans COMPACT Act of 2020,” which amends various VA authorities related to: transition assistance; suicide prevention; and improvement of care and services for women veterans.
